svg.text: OdAR System with Nanotubular Follicle Integration

g.text: Testing Chamber with Nanofollicle Testing Setup
- Attachment: Microadhesive bonding to sensor substrate
- Signal pathway: Direct electrical connection to PCB
- Array configuration: 8 follicles per sensor unit
Nanofollicle Array Integration with MOS and Polymer Sensors
